welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pavlodar, Kazakhstan! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's unique blend of historical charm and modern energy. Explore our beautiful parks, bustling markets, and rich cultural heritage - we hope you enjoy every moment of your visit.

restaurants.name: ДВИН
restaurants.description: ДВИН is a eastern european restaurant located in Павлодар.
restaurants.address: 140000, Павлодарская область, Павлодар, Торговая ул. (Кутузова ул.)

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pavlodar Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
